short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy and paste accent letters on just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get an accent letters keyboard with one click. You will get the most common accent letters like cedilla, diaeresis, or umlaut, circumflex, grave accent, or tilde.

How to type accent letters using this extension?

☑ Click on the accented letter, The letter will be copied to your clipboard as well as the letter will be inserted in the white box area. 
☑ Here you can click on another letter, that will be again inserted in the white box area.
☑ Click On the 'Capital' And 'small' buttons to get Capital accented letters and small case accented letters respectively. 
☑ Use ← the button as a backspace key.
